name: SIEMME 2016
tagline: The 22th China-Japan Bilateral Symposium on Intelligent Electrophotonic Materials and Molecular Electronics
body: [TOC] ## Welcome Welcome to SIEMME 2016, also _the 22th China-Japan Bilateral Symposium on Intelligent Electrophotonic Materials and Molecular Electronics_, is about to be held in Suzhou on September 22-24, 2016. [Southeast University](http://www.seu.edu.cn) (China) and [Tokyo University of Science](http://www.tus.ac.jp) (Japan) will organize the symposium together. ## Overview * 220+ attendees * 3 sections * [5 plenary talks](#pt) * 36 invited talks * 50 oral talks * 100+ posters ## plenary talks | [![Akira Fujishima](img/fujishima.jpg)][fujishima] | [![Kam W. Leong](img/leong.jpg)][leong] | [![Lei Jiang](img/jiang.jpg)][jiang] | [![Kazuhiro Hashimoto](img/hashimoto.jpg)][hashimoto] | [![Yanling Song](img/song.jpg)][song] | | ---- | ---- | ---- | ---- | ---- | | [A. Fujishima][fujishima] | [K. W. Leong][leong] | [L. Jiang][jiang] | [K. Hashimoto][hashimoto] | [Y. Song][song] | | TUS | Columbia U | CAS | NIMS | CAS | [fujishima]: http://www.sut.ac.jp/en/initiatives/vol01 [leong]: http://orion.bme.columbia.edu [jiang]: http://jianglei.iccas.ac.cn [hashimoto]: http://www.nims.go.jp/nims/ [song]: http://ylsong.iccas.ac.cn * [Akira Fujishima][fujishima] (Tokyo University of Science). *Recent Progress in Photocatalysis International Research Center.* * [Kam W. Leong][leong](Columbia University). *Place the report title here.* * [Lei Jiang][jiang] (Chinese Academy of Sciences). *Smart Interfacial Materials from Super-Wettability to Binary Cooperative Complementary Systems.* * [Kazuhiro Hashimoto][hashimoto] (National Institute for Materials Science). *Challenges/Priorities in Japan around Advanced Materials Science and Engineering.* * [Yanling Song][song] (Chinese Academy of Sciences). *Nanomaterial green printing based on surface wettability manipulation.*
